typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TrainingProviderName as string,
		RegDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT TrainingProviderName, substring(isnull(DeletedDateTimeStamp,0),1,10) as RegDate\nFROM Stg.RAA_Vacancies\nWHERE TrainingProviderName like \'Emma%\' or TrainingProviderName like \'Rob%\'',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source(output(
		ProviderID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		RegDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT ProviderID,FullName,Substring(cast(ContractedFrom as varchar),1,10) as RegDate\nFROM Stg.AVMS_PROVIDER\nwhere fullname like \'Emma%\'\nor fullname like \'Rob%\'',
	format: 'query') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(soundex(TrainingProviderName) == soundex(FullName),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(TrainingProviderName = toString(TrainingProviderName)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		SourseSK as integer,
		BinaryId as string,
		TypeCode as string,
		IdamUserId as string,
		UserType as string,
		UserName as string,
		UserEmail as string,
		UserCreatedTimeStamp as string,
		LastSignedInTimeStamp as string,
		EmployerAccountId as string,
		Ukprn as string,
		RunId as long,
		AsDm_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		AsDm_UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
